entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
